summary: Iteration 46 - Tested menu reorganization and PDF generation features for parceiro. All 4 features working correctly: 1) Financeiro menu no longer contains Dashboard/Empresas Fatura√ß√£o, 2) Profile dropdown contains both links, 3) ConfiguracaoRelatorios has PDF generation section with Semana/Ano inputs and Gerar PDF button, 4) PDF download works correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Layout.js: financeiroSubmenu correctly does NOT include Dashboard Fatura√ß√£o or Empresas Fatura√ß√£o links (lines 136-143)
Layout.js: Profile dropdown for parceiro correctly includes 'Empresas de Fatura√ß√£o' (line 460-464) and 'Dashboard Fatura√ß√£o' (line 465-469) with proper data-testid attributes
ConfiguracaoRelatorios.js: PDF generation section implemented correctly with Semana/Ano inputs and 'Gerar PDF' button (lines 152-209)
ConfiguracaoRelatorios.js: handleGerarPDF function properly calls API endpoint and handles blob download (lines 70-99)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Menu reorganization verified: 'Dashboard Fatura√ß√£o' and 'Empresas de Fatura√ß√£o' moved from Financeiro menu to Profile dropdown. PDF generation feature at /configuracao-relatorios working correctly - downloads PDF file 'resumo_semanal_S{week}_{year}.pdf'. Both data-testid attributes (link-dashboard-faturacao, link-empresas-faturacao, btn-gerar-pdf) are in place for testing.
